mapper.select: SELECT a.end_time endTime, a.machine_code machineCode FROM t_machine a WHERE a.machine_code = #{machineCode}

SELECT a.end_time endTime, a.machine_code machineCode, a.machine_name machineName, a.create_time createTime, a.id, a.user_id userId, a.del_flag FROM t_machine a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} and a.del_flag = 0 order by a.create_time desc limit #{offset},#{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM t_machine a WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} and a.del_flag = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_machine( machine_code, machine_name, user_id, create_time, end_time ) value ( #{machineCode}, #{machineName}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{endTime} )
insert into t_user_pay_log( machine_code, user_id, create_time, pay_code ) value ( #{machineCode}, #{userId}, #{createTime}, #{payCode} )
